text:
Hey everyone, I wanted to let you know that the Tapfiliate blog is now open for pitches for Q1 of 2022. 

:white_check_mark: Requirements for pitchers. Your website needs to have a DR of 70+. Please send through previous writing samples and your ideas to me via DM here. 

:arrow_right:Deadline for pitches  is 1st December.

I will reply to you shortly after the deadline to let you know if you have been successful and what the next steps are.

elements.text: Hey everyone, I wanted to let you know that the Tapfiliate blog is now open for pitches for Q1 of 2022.
Requirements for pitchers. Your website needs to have a DR of 70+. Please send through previous writing samples and your ideas to me via DM here.

Deadline for pitches  is 1st December.
